verbs.description: [ARG0: President Donald Trump] [V: said] [ARG1: the U.S. would allow Chinese telecommunications - equipment maker ZTE Corp. to remain in business after paying a $ 1.3 billion fine , changing its management and board and providing “ high - level security guarantees] . ”
